description.narrative: The project development objective is to enhance equitable access to and improve the quality of ECD services.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Audited Annual Financial Statements | Description :Audited Annual Project Financial Statements to be submittedto the Bank no later than six months of the following fiscal year | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Consolidated Project Interim Unaudited Financial Reports | Description :Consolidated project IUFRs to besubmitted no later than 45 days following the end of the reporting quarter | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Implementation Agreement with the Plantation Human Development Trust | Description :The Recipient has enteredinto an Implementation Agreement with the Plantation Human Development Trust | Due Date :01-Oct-2015

Finance Agreement :Project Management Unit | Description :Establishment of a Project Management Unit, which shall be maintainedthroughout the implementation of the Project, and staffed with competent personnel in adequate numbers, with qualifications,experience and terms of reference acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :01-Oct-2015
Finance Agreement :Project Operational Manual | Description :The Project Operational Manual shall be adopted by the Recipient | DueDate :01-Oct-2015

Finance Agreement :Project Steering Committee | Description :Establishment of a Project Steering Committee which shall bemaintained throughout the implementation of the Project. | Due Date :01-Oct-2015

Finance Agreement :Safeguards Compliance | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordancewith the Safeguards Instruments as described in Section I of Schedule 2 of the Financing Agreement | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: ECD centers established in unserved/ underserved areas
ECD teachers and teacher assistants completing standardized short-term training
Awareness programs conducted by SMWCD, PCs and ECD centers
ECD centers receiving facility improvement grants
Children receiving tuition fee support through the project
ECD centers conducting annual child development assessments
ECD centers aligned with national quality standards
Establishment and utilization of M & E system

target.value: M & E system functionalMonitoring data from 80% of ECD centers in MIS

actual.value: The M&E system has been functional. The mini-census data gaps are identified and the M& E system is functional. Monitoring datafrom 80 percent of ECD centers is available in MIS

title.narrative: Beneficiary feedback survey from Provinces through Social Audits

target.value: Findings of social audit conducted in all nine provinces disseminated to all provinces.

actual.value: Social audit bids were called. Technical evaluation in progress.

title.narrative: Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Development of ECD Curriculum Guideline and Monitoring Framework

baseline.value: Draft curriculum tabled to the National ECD committee.

target.value: New curriculum approved and pilot test commenced.

title.narrative: Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning - Female
